description:
When packaging nova for Fedora we noticed that there are no man pages.

Even help2man generated output would be better than nothing.

openstack-nova.noarch: W: no-manual-page-for-binary nova-clear-rabbit-queues

title: man pages are missing for all the programs

comments.content:
When packaging nova for Fedora we noticed that there are no man pages.

Even help2man generated output would be better than nothing.
